Text: OpportunitiesLouise I am a head hunter in London and I specialise in the energy sector Would you be interested in returning to the UK to work for a company with ambition and a strong balance sheet to support its intentions in online trading You would be an excellent choice of person to lead this effort Can we discuss this I can be reached at the numbers below Best Regards Richard Richard Wilson Principal Consultant European Energy Utilities Practice TMP Worldwide Chancery House Chancery Lane LondonWCA QS Tel Cel Fax Email Sponsors to the Utility Congress and Offshore Europe
